question: yay :D i just found out (my mom came into my room) that i in fact do not have type one diabetes :) i actually have been diagnosed to be an anemic and surpisingly enough they have the same symptoms :P sooo i am happy that i do not have diabetes, but i still might have to take shots :( im just happy that its not as bad as diabetes, i will have to take **** for a while and then they will see what will happen from there :) thank youu to everyone that has helped me throughout this process and i will always remember youu in my heart (:
title: OMg i figured it out :D
